display_html:
data Constants = Constants {
  • minNumGenInputs ∷ Int
  • maxNumGenInputs ∷ Int
  • frequencyRegKeyCert ∷ Int
  • frequencyRegPoolCert ∷ Int
  • frequencyDelegationCert ∷ Int
  • frequencyGenesisDelegationCert ∷ Int
  • frequencyDeRegKeyCert ∷ Int
  • frequencyRetirePoolCert ∷ Int
  • frequencyMIRCert ∷ Int
  • frequencyScriptCredReg ∷ Int
  • frequencyKeyCredReg ∷ Int
  • frequencyScriptCredDeReg ∷ Int
  • frequencyKeyCredDeReg ∷ Int
  • frequencyScriptCredDelegation ∷ Int
  • frequencyKeyCredDelegation ∷ Int
  • frequencyTxUpdates ∷ Int
  • minGenesisUTxOouts ∷ Int
  • maxGenesisUTxOouts ∷ Int
  • maxCertsPerTx ∷ Word64
  • maxTxsPerBlock ∷ Word64
  • maxNumKeyPairs ∷ Word64
  • minGenesisOutputVal ∷ Integer
  • maxGenesisOutputVal ∷ Integer
  • numBaseScripts ∷ Int
  • frequencyNoWithdrawals ∷ Int
  • frequencyAFewWithdrawals ∷ Int
  • maxAFewWithdrawals ∷ Int
  • frequencyPotentiallyManyWithdrawals ∷ Int
  • minSlotTrace ∷ Int
  • maxSlotTrace ∷ Int
  • frequencyLowMaxEpoch ∷ Word64
  • maxMinFeeA ∷ Natural
  • maxMinFeeB ∷ Natural
  • numCoreNodes ∷ Word64
}
name: Constants Constants minNumGenInputs maxNumGenInputs frequencyRegKeyCert frequencyRegPoolCert frequencyDelegationCert frequencyGenesisDelegationCert frequencyDeRegKeyCert frequencyRetirePoolCert frequencyMIRCert frequencyScriptCredReg frequencyKeyCredReg frequencyScriptCredDeReg frequencyKeyCredDeReg frequencyScriptCredDelegation frequencyKeyCredDelegation frequencyTxUpdates minGenesisUTxOouts maxGenesisUTxOouts maxCertsPerTx maxTxsPerBlock maxNumKeyPairs minGenesisOutputVal maxGenesisOutputVal numBaseScripts frequencyNoWithdrawals frequencyAFewWithdrawals maxAFewWithdrawals frequencyPotentiallyManyWithdrawals minSlotTrace maxSlotTrace frequencyLowMaxEpoch maxMinFeeA maxMinFeeB numCoreNodes

display_html:
data ValidationError
  • = BadInputs
  • | Expired SlotNo SlotNo
  • | RetirementCertExpired SlotNo SlotNo
  • | FeeTooSmall Coin Coin
  • | ValueNotConserved Coin Coin
  • | IncorrectRewards
  • | InvalidWitness
  • | MissingWitnesses
  • | InputSetEmpty
  • | StakeKeyAlreadyRegistered
  • | StakeKeyNotRegistered
  • | StakeDelegationImpossible
  • | StakePoolNotRegisteredOnKey
  • | UnknownValidationError
name: ValidationError UnknownValidationError StakePoolNotRegisteredOnKey StakeDelegationImpossible StakeKeyNotRegistered StakeKeyAlreadyRegistered InputSetEmpty MissingWitnesses InvalidWitness IncorrectRewards ValueNotConserved FeeTooSmall RetirementCertExpired Expired BadInputs

display_html:
data ToTokens where
  • T ∷ (Tokens → Tokens) → ToTokens
  • S ∷ ToCBOR a ⇒ a → ToTokens
  • G ∷ ToCBORGroup a ⇒ a → ToTokens
  • Plus ∷ ToTokens → ToTokens → ToTokens
name: ToTokens G Plus T S

display_html:
data AllPoolKeys = AllPoolKeys {
  • cold ∷ KeyPair StakePool
  • vrf ∷ (SignKeyVRF, VerKeyVRF)
  • hot ∷ [(KESPeriod, (SignKeyKES, VerKeyKES))]
  • hk ∷ KeyHash StakePool
}
name: AllPoolKeys AllPoolKeys cold hk vrf hot

display_html:
data GenEnv = GenEnv {
  • geKeySpace ∷ KeySpace
  • geConstants ∷ Constants
}
name: GenEnv GenEnv geKeySpace geConstants

display_html:
data KeySpace = KeySpace_ {
  • ksCoreNodes ∷ [(CoreKeyPair, AllPoolKeys)]
  • ksKeyPairs ∷ KeyPairs
  • ksKeyPairsByHash ∷ Map (KeyHash Testing) (KeyPair Testing)
  • ksKeyPairsByStakeHash ∷ Map (KeyHash Staking) (KeyPair Staking)
  • ksMSigScripts ∷ MultiSigPairs
  • ksVRFKeyPairs ∷ [(SignKeyVRF, VerKeyVRF)]
  • ksVRFKeyPairsByHash ∷ Map VRFKeyHash (SignKeyVRF, VerKeyVRF)
}
name: KeySpace KeySpace_ ksCoreNodes ksKeyPairs ksKeyPairsByHash ksKeyPairsByStakeHash ksMSigScripts ksVRFKeyPairs ksVRFKeyPairsByHash

  • = CoreKeyCred [CoreKeyPair]
  • | KeyCred (KeyPair Staking)
  • | ScriptCred (MultiSig, MultiSig)
  • | NoCred
